System::SingletonStatic

System::SingletonStatic< T > Class Template Reference

Inheritance diagram for System::SingletonStatic< T >:

List of all members.

Detailed Description

template<class T>
class System::SingletonStatic< T >

Base class to create static singletons. This means that its creation/destruction cycle is not controlled. If you need to control the creation/destruction of the singleton use the Singleton class.

For internal use only.


Static Public Member Functions

static T & getSingleton ()
 Returns a reference to the singleton instance.
static T * getSingletonPtr ()
 Returns a pointer to the singleton instance.
